sub_title: Empowering Tellent's Partners to achieve success I HR Tech _ SaaS | ❤️ Social connections. Let's talk?
summary:
👋Hey there, great to see you here!

My life goal is to inspire people and help the world to be a better place for everyone. It sounds cheesy, I know, but it's true. :)

Professionally, I encourage others to get one step closer to their best version, by exchanging experiences and guiding professionals to a brighter future in the Netherlands. 
In my private life, in 2018, via my Instagram page, I created a project called "Brasileiras na Holanda", where I organize encounters of Brazilian women living in the Netherlands, helping them to meet each other and to create a support network in the "tulip and windmill" country, so far we have already had 15 meetings, and many connections were created. I am proud to say that I have already connected over 200 women through this beautiful project.

I was born in Brazil and since I moved to the Netherlands, in 2014, I have been working as International Recruiter. I have also lived in NY, the US, for a while, and it was a blast! * Yes, I love travelling (and living) around the world and eating my way through the places I visit. 

I thrive in rapidly growing, innovative organizations, I’m passionate about providing the best recruiting experience for candidates and hiring managers in an end-to-end recruitment process.
Hands-on experience with international databases, focusing on the desired project result. 
I enjoy bringing in and executing new ideas, as well as working on improving existing processes in order to elevate positive results.

My Bachelor's degree is in Tourism Management, but recruitment took my heart, so here I'm! 

I speak English and Portuguese at a fluent level, advanced Dutch and intermediate Spanish, so I guess I can cover a lot!🌎 

Characteristics:
✶ Communicative
✶ Positivity
✶ Engaging people 

Full-on yellow energy! :) Ah, because of my passion for social media, over the last six years, I have been in charge of the social media channels of the companies I worked for.

Dutch nationality
International | Recruitment | Business Development and Strategic Marketing | Lead Generation | Innovation | Customer Focus | CRM | Passion|  LATAM | Team Worker | Flexibility | Candidate journey freak!

profile_positions.description:
• Focus on full-cycle recruitment with long-lasting results - I'm hiring for all different types of business roles, such as Partnerships, Marketing and Customer Success, with a 95% acceptance rate.
• Responsible for Recruitee's LinkedIn Recruiter account 
• Response rate above 50%
• Responsible for revamping the Recruitee's career website and many other projects such as Candidate journey, pre-onboarding landings-page, etc.
• Hoster on a panel discussion - " How to tackle remote discrimination" focus was on inclusivity, diversity and humanization of the recruitment process

Role:
• Performing a 360° Recruitment for business professionals: Sourcing, choosing qualified applicants, background search, different types of interview, and delivering an outstanding candidate journey
• Hands-on LinkedIn recruiter, Boolean search, and identifying talents
• Direct contact with Hiring Managers
• Reviewing the job vacancies and profiles 


Interview | International Recruiter | Candidate journey | Innovation | Recruitment process | Personal branding


Recruitee is the number one collaborative hiring software to build winning teams. More than 118,000 users from 4,000+ companies are finding it easy to navigate through Recruitee's intuitive UX to build custom pipelines, attract and source top talent, evaluate candidates, and hire future team members.

profile_positions.description:
About Planeta Balneario: specialized in homemade snacks and sweets since 1995. In 2010, together with my sister, we became partners and owners of the company, maintaining the existing task force/staff. 

Responsibilities from March 2012 until May 2014:
• Creating a relationship with the public by providing quality snacks and sweets in Salvador, and managing staff from various backgrounds of skills, work experience, and ethnicity
• Control inventory of food on a weekly basis to minimize costs
• Implement marketing strategies to track existing and new customers
• Maintaining high standards of quality control, cleanliness, and safety
• Set up training sessions with vendors and restaurant employees while coordinating meetings
• Developing and maintaining the website, creating advertising campaigns, and promoting the company via all social media channels

Highly People Focused | Handle Complain | Exceptional Customer Service l  Maintains Good Staff Relations l Administrative Task |
